attributes.action: Halt Brexit pending public inquiry into disinformation tactics
attributes.additional_details:
House of Commons Digital, Cultural, Media and Sport Committee (DCMS) report HC 1791:
 
https://publications.parliament.uk/pa/cm201719/cmselect/cmcumeds/1791/1791.pdf
attributes.background: The DCMS report HC1791 revealed shocking findings on disinformation and hacking of UK democracy by "forces intent on causing disruption and confusion". We call for an investigation of disinformation tactics used, and withdrawal of A50 pending findings - Brexit may be a result of such tactics.
